scripts.backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8765
scripts.build:backend: export CODESIGN_IDENTITY="${CODESIGN_IDENTITY:-$(grep '^CODESIGN_IDENTITY=' .env.local 2>/dev/null | cut -d= -f2-)}"; cd backend && poetry run pyinstaller think.spec --clean && [ -n "$CODESIGN_IDENTITY" ] && find dist/think-backend \( -name '*.dylib' -o -name '*.so' \) -exec codesign --force --sign "$CODESIGN_IDENTITY" --timestamp --options runtime {} \; || echo 'Skipping signing (CODESIGN_IDENTITY not set)'
scripts.build:app: pnpm --filter think-app build && pnpm --filter think-app electron:build
scripts.build:app:release: pnpm --filter think-app build && pnpm --filter think-app electron:build:release
scripts.build:all: pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:stub && pnpm build:app
scripts.build:all:release: pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:stub && pnpm build:app:release
